response.original_title: Love In Every Word 2: The Wedding
response.overview: As love blossoms into a forever they once only dreamed of, Chioma and Obiora stand on the edge of a beautiful new beginning. But when secrets from the past and faces they thought were long gone return, their love is tested in ways their hearts never imagined. In a journey woven with passion, forgiveness, and destiny, they must discover whether love is strong enough to heal old wounds and write the ending their souls have always desired. ðŸ’•
